metadata.title: CVE-2024-26979 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium
metadata.description:
** REJECT ** This CVE ID has been rejected or withdrawn by its CVENumbering Authority.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2024-26979` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

linux-image-4.4.0-1003-fips - 4.4.0-1098.105
linux-image-extra-4.4.0-1003-fips - 4.4.0-1098.105
linux-image-hmac-4.4.0-1003-fips - 4.4.0-1098.105
Available with Ubuntu Pro: https://ubuntu.com/pro

criterions.comment: linux-fips package in fips-updates/xenial, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '4.4.0-1098.105').
